name: Interstellar Rangers
description:
Interstellar Rangers

In Interstellar Rangers, you control 3 ships at the same time as hoards of enemies give you a whole load of hassle. You fly fast while separate, but press Space and the ships join together for increased firepower.

Each ship also has its own special attack. Try combining a gravity bomb with a fire blast to take out a bunch of enemies in one go!

I made this game as part of Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1. It was my first game jam, and the first game that I've built from scratch. It's not exactly amazing (or original!), but I had a lot of fun making it, and I'm really happy with how much I've learnt this last week 🥳

Credits

The background image on the title screen is by Ansimuz.

The music is "Jump and Shoot Man" from the 8-Bit Music Booster Pack by Bit By Bit Bert.

The keyboard key icons on the title screen are from Pixel Button Prompts! (Keyboard/Gamepad) by Retrocade Media
